get.description: Provide application name or domain url

parameters.name: location_type
parameters.description: Provide location type to query on. Possible values : country, state, city

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Field is optional when location_type is country. If querying for state, provide id of country. If querying for city, provide id of state.

post.description: Get Webhook Event Details for provided events
post.summary: queryWebhookEventDetails | Send webhook event name, type, version, category in request body to get complete details of event from server

get.summary: getConfigByApiKey | Get Slingshot Configuration Of  A Company
get.description: REST Endpoint that returns all configuration detail of a company

get.summary: getApiKey | Get Slingshot Configuration Of  A Company
get.description: REST Endpoint that returns apikey by username by password

get.summary: getJobByCode | Get Job Config By Code
get.description: REST Endpoint that returns job config by code

get.summary: getJobConfigByIntegrationType | Get Job Configs By Integration Type
get.description: REST Endpoint that returns all job Configs by Integration Type

get.summary: getJobCodesMetrics | Find all the JobCodes from Metrics Collection based on the field Values
get.description: Endpoint to return all JobCodes present in Metrics Collection

enum.name: ALL
enum.description: Use if you want to subscribe for all application_ids (Sales channels). Provide 'application_id:[]' (empty array) with this config

enum.name: EMPTY
enum.description: Use if you are subscribing only company level events. Provide 'application_id:[]' (empty array) with this config

enum.name: SPECIFIC-EVENTS
enum.description: Use when subscribing to specific application_ids (Sales channels)

enum.name: blocked
enum.description: Subscriber is blocked by system due to multiple failed delivery attempts.
